title: By Schism Rent Asunder-David Weber
description:
By Schism Rent Asunder is a science fiction book written by David Weber. 

It is the second book in the open-ended Safehold series, after Off Armageddon Reef.

Upping this, because I was not able to buy it at a bookstore, or order it...

phyrexian, over and out.
